segments.text: How many do you intend to order for our shirts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the minimum quantity of an order for your goods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are not interested in small orders . I suggest you order at least 2 000 dozen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We want a minimum of 1,000 dozen of men's shirts and a minimum of 3,000 dozen of embroidered shirts . Can you guarantee continuous production and adequate supply ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . We have enough productivity . You can rest assured .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And for such a big quantity , you should give us a discount .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , we can reduce our price by ten percent .
segments.speaker: S1
